title: Method Statement for Underground Drainage Pipes
description:
Method Statement for Underground Drainage Pipes

Method Statement for Underground Drainage Pipes is Mechanical engineering documentation suitable for MEP construction works. See content preview below. The document is editable according to your preferences. 

Document Preview

1.)Purpose
The purpose of this Method Statement is to describe the Methodology for installation of UPVC pipe laying and backfilling for the site facilities and to detail the steps to be taken to meet the HSE requirements specified for the execution.

2.)Methodology
Installation of  under ground drainage pipe. A) Provide labor, materials, equipment and services, and perform operations required for complete installation of the Drainage and Vent Systems and related work as indicated on the drawings.
B.)Pitch horizontal piping not less than 1/8 inch per foot down in direction of flow.

File Type: Microsoft Word 2007 or Above
File Size : 149 Kilo Byte (KB)
